```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)


```


```{r}
x <- 3
ex_1 <- expression(x^2)
my_derivative_1 <- deriv(ex_1, "x")
```


```{r}
a <- 1.2
ex_2 <- expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^4 - 5)
my_derivative_2 <- deriv(ex_1, "a")
```


```{r}
t = 0
ex_3 <- expression((-4 * t) / (t ^ 2 + 1) ^ 3)
my_derivative_3 <- deriv(ex_3, "t")
```
